researcher.title: Exploring the Frontiers of AI
researcher.costTitle: Working Group Member - Computational Techniques in Tabletop Games Heritage
researcher.costDesc: Contributing to international research on board game heritage and AI-driven analysis of game dynamics. Interdisciplinary collaboration across Europe applying NLP and vision models.

hero.name: Timucin
hero.description: AI Research Engineer specializing in LLMs, LangChain, and machine learning. PhD candidate at ITU.

home.title: AI Research Engineer
home.subtitle: Building intelligent systems with LLMs, LangChain, and modern AI architectures. PhD candidate at ITU, lecturer at Istinye University.
home.featuredProjectsDesc: A selection of my work in LLM and AI development.
home.technologiesDesc: Tools and frameworks I work with daily.
home.letsWorkDesc: Interested in AI projects or research collaborations? Get in touch.

projects.title: Projects
projects.project1Desc: Academic citation formatting tool with 100K+ users on GPT Store.
projects.project1FullDesc: A custom GPT that helps researchers and students format citations according to APA 7th edition guidelines.
projects.project1Challenge: Academic citation formatting is error-prone and time-consuming for researchers.
projects.project1Solution: Built a conversational AI that understands context and provides accurate APA 7 citations.
projects.project1Result3: Featured in GPT Store academic category
projects.project1Learning1: Prompt engineering for consistent output formatting
projects.project1Learning2: Handling edge cases in citation styles
projects.project2Desc: Autonomous curriculum matching system with LangChain and LangGraph.
projects.project3Desc: Automated exam grading system with LangSmith evaluation pipelines.
projects.project4Desc: Enterprise RAG-based translation system for domain-specific content.
projects.project5Desc: Multi-agent system for automated email communication and task delegation.
projects.project6Desc: ML-based disease prediction using ensemble learning methods.
projects.project7Desc: High-performance ensemble learning system with LLM-driven data correction pipeline for Turkcell's pre-legal workflows.
projects.project8Desc: LSTM-based deep learning model for time-series forecasting of hospital revenue and patient inflow.
projects.project9Desc: Automated content generation agents for social media platforms using LLMs.
projects.project10Desc: Deterministic simulation workflow with custom state-transition logic for modeling audience psychology.
projects.project11Desc: Semantic category matching algorithm achieving 10x higher accuracy in cross-market taxonomy alignment.
projects.project12Desc: Sales forecasting infrastructure for e-bebek, optimizing inventory management using ensemble methods.
projects.project13Desc: Stress detection algorithms for gamified Apple Watch app, analyzing biometric signals in pediatric groups.
projects.project14Desc: License plate recognition pipeline using OpenCV and Tesseract OCR for edge processing.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm an AI Research Engineer specializing in Large Language Models and autonomous agent systems. Currently pursuing a PhD at Istanbul Technical University.
about.exp1Desc: Ensemble learning and LLM pipeline development under TUBITAK 1505 project.
about.exp2Desc: Teaching Intelligent Agents and Machine Learning in Digital Game Design department.
about.exp3Desc: RAG-based translation system, disease prediction, revenue forecasting.
